page.title: 12Childrens Games in Meltham
page.content: Children's games showed a lot of variation.The most popular playground games are{hide and seek,bob tig}(a variation on catch where you must bob before you are caught) and{french {cricket.Build up},was popular,where people join on the end of the line and run around wildly.This was dangerous in a crowded yard.Boys enjoy{"SLAM,"} kicking a ball against a space on a wall,if the ball missed or hit the player on the return he took a letter.Younger boys played{stock cars, charging around making noises pretending to hit crash barriers.Girls played{stones,}bouncing a ball and throwing stones in the air which they tried to catch on the back of their hands before the ball bounced again.
